name: Dragon Slayer (itch) (MrSkul)
description:
A Game Where You play with the outdated robo who didnt get mind controlled by the mega-dragon awakened to take over the robo verse, you have to escape his minions and find the hidden mega-robo machine to use it to battle the almighty mega-dragon and restore the robo verse. 

- All models/animation/sounds are also my creation (modeling / rigging / animating) in Addition to game programming.  

ps *ZipTieDev is the former name of SKUL Games*
